name: Penis Shoot
description:
Penis Shoot is a game where you play as a penis and kill sperm! 

in this exciting thrill seeking shooter you'll experience the real thrills of killing sperm!

score 1000 points to win or kill 50 sperms to beat the game! remember to be careful as those sperms are pretty slippery and can kill you too!

if you enjoy the game or if it gave you a laugh please don't hesitate to leave a dollar donation  <3
